text: allah hæra ovunata vipatak nokarana emenma ovunata prayojanavat novana dæta ovuhu næmædum karati. movuhu allah vetin vu apage mædihatkaruvo’ yæyi ovuhu pavasati. ‘ahashi ho mahapolove ho ohu nodanna dæ numbala allahta danvannehu dæ’yi (nabivaraya) numba asanu. ohu supivituruya. ovun adesa karana dæyin ohu uttaritaraya
